name: Te Anau Lakeview Holiday Park & Motels
nameEN: Te Anau Lakeview Holiday Park & Motels
description:
Haere Mai and welcome to Te Anau Lakeview Holiday Park & Motels, we invite you to experience Fiordland from our spacious lakeside Holiday Park & Motels. Enjoy incredible views across picturesque Lake Te Anau and into Fiordland's mountains - immerse yourself in the vast wilderness as it meets Te Anau. 

Stay at least one night to fully enjoy your journey to Milford or Doubtful Sound. The Te Anau–Milford Sound Highway is one of the most scenic and rewarding driving experiences in New Zealand. This is “must see” New Zealand. Our family-owned Holiday Park is situated on the south shore of Lake Te Anau. 

Te Anau Lakeview Holiday Park and Motels has been evaluated by Qualmark, and awarded Gold under the Sustainable Tourism Business criteria.

Our quiet established park has amazing lake and mountain views, children’s play area, BBQs, picnic tables, TV lounge, FREE WIFI throughout the park. laundries, 6-person spa pool for hire between 1st October until 30th April (closed between 1st May to 30th September), communal bathrooms and kitchens. Free activity advice and bookings at reception. 

Te Anau Lakeview Holiday Park and Motels is Qualmark rated four star plus (2017), we offer an affordable range of accommodation to suit most budgets. Right beside the park is Ivon Wilson Park where the family can use the walking tracks, cross country bike trails, play frisbee golf or children can take their fishing rods and learn to fish.

HOSTEL POLICIES:
Check in: 2.00 pm
Check out: 10.00 am
Office hours: Monday to Friday 9.00am to 6.00pm // Saturday to Sunday 9.00am to 12.00noon and 1.30pm to 6.00pm
Please advise if arriving after these hours so we can arrange a late arrival for you to retrieve your key and arrival information.

No animals or pets
No smoking
Private Single Rooms are not suitable for children 18 years or under. 
Free WiFi is provided to check emails and social media. Large files may not load.
Bookings must have at least 1 adult. Child policy: Infants are 0-4, children are 5-14, adults are 15+.

CANCELLATION POLICY
Cancellations made more than 24 hours before arrival: Receive a refund of deposit charged less a 10% admin fee which is calculated on total booking cost.
Cancellations made within 24 hours of arrival: No refund –  one (1) nights accommodation will be charged.

ACTIVITIES BOOKING POLICY
Full payment is required at the time of booking. All bookings are subject to availability. Cancellations are at the discretion of the tour operator (most require a minimum of 24 hours notice).

houseRules.notes:
HOSTEL POLICIES:
Check in: 2.00 pm
Check out: 10.00 am
Office hours: 7.30 am to 9.00 pm (Summer Hours), 8.00 am to 7.30 pm (Winter Hours)
Please advise if arriving after these hours so we can arrange a late arrival for you to retrieve your key and arrival information.

CANCELLATION POLICY
Cancellations made within 24 hours of arrival will be charged the amount equal to the first nights accommodation will be charged.

No animals or pets
No smoking
Dorms are not suitable for children
Free WiFi is provided to check emails and social media. Large files may not load.
Bookings must have at least 1 adult. Child policy: Infants are 0-4, children are 5-14, adults are 15+.

RESERVATION POLICY

Credit card details are required from which one (1) nights accommodation will be charged at the time of booking to confirm your stay. The balance (if any) is due at check in.
Reservations made via third party websites are subject to that websites booking policies.

CANCELLATION POLICY

Cancellations made more than 24 hours before arrival: Receive a refund of deposit charged less a 10% admin fee which is calculated on total booking cost.

Cancellations made within 24 hours of arrival: No refund - minimum of one (1) nights accommodation will be charged.

Cancellations for reservations made via Third Party websites are subject to that websites cancellation policies.

ACTIVITIES BOOKING POLICY

Full payment is required at the time of booking. All bookings are subject to availability. Cancellations are at the discretion of the tour operator (most require a minimum of 24 hours notice).
